title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Metacognitive Expedition Team: Learning Social Issues Through VR Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social studies knowledge and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can reflect on their learning processes by applying metacognitive journaling techniques with over 80% accuracy
Learners can adaptively utilize over three metacognitive strategies (e.g., planning-monitoring-evaluation) while solving social issues in VR simulations
Learners can improve metacognitive activities based on peer feedback to achieve over 70% competency in final projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
